name: Attention
description: You're a business man. You notice New Yorkers are neglecting the plant life in the city! You collect them, you chuck them at the trees! PAY ATTENTION YOU SPEEDY NEW YORKERS! This game was created around the issue of the pace of New Yorkers. I created a sandbox world where you don't have to save the trees, you could just roam around and find secrets, or you could save the trees by forcing people to pay attention to them.
